pages.title: Vanilla redstone
pages.text: Here will be a list of vanilla style blocks added by mods.
A lamp that doesn't need to be powered by redstone
Like the vanilla redstone lamp but emits a light level according to the strength of the input redstone signal.

pages.title: Colored Slime
pages.text: Colored slime wont stick to other types of colored slime block. Supported colors include: red, blue, cyan, magenta and yellow.
